subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: Armstrong pleaded guilty to careless driving for hitting two parked cars with his sport utility vehicle in December in Aspen, Colo., a prosecutor said.
snippet: Armstrong pleaded guilty to careless driving for hitting two parked cars with his sport utility vehicle in December in Aspen, Colo., a prosecutor said.
